website_summaries.verdict: Achieve high speeds and conquer hills with this powerful electric longboard.
pros: Great for getting around and saving energy
cons: One of the most expensive options available

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun.
customer_reviews.text: I love this board. I am a land paddler and have had several wonderful rides between the rain and cold spells. I knew it was January...I thought paddling along might mess with the sensors but it is super fun and really seems to know what you’re thinking. It does not try to run away from me or throw me off. The remote did not work and the replacement they sent does not either. The replacement is a different remote and has no high/low speed setting switch and is slightly larger than a bic lighter. This is irritating but it’s so fun to ride hands free I can wait...I hope they’ll get me a working remote.
customer_reviews.author: Muzicmang

customer_reviews.title: Electric longboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old son. He has experience on skateboards but this is his first eskate. He loves it. The board can achieve roughly 20 MPH, and there it takes hills with ease. Charges really fast and the battery lasts for hours. Its perfect compact skate its liter hevy that give you more stability to ride. More maneuverable than the longboard, but a slightly harsher ride due to not having the flex of the longboard. Overall, this is a great purchase for my son. He is enjoying it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I had brought this special piece for my hubby as the gift for X-max and birthday. He is the fan of skateboard for years and years. Seems he enjoy it and ride great. I did read through the details and asked him how is it feels about this item. I actually tried it myself(of course with my hubby on the side as a newbie lol) to lean forward to move forward and back to slow down. I didn’t control well, but my hubby does when I watch him show. Overall, the product is in good quality and parts are well installed.
customer_reviews.author: Angela McCoy

customer_reviews.title: It was so cool!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a right board that is very easy to use and control for a very long time. I’m a person who with no skill and balance every time when I play always fell and get hurt but when I first bought this board, it’s very simple if I want to move forward just simply lean forward on the front sensors, if I need it to slow down, stop or reverse? Just lean back. Also this motorized longboard also comes with a remote that can control every aspect of the ride, from accelerating to switching speed modes. It was a cool product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome. I love it. But one of the two of the bolts to hold on the front truck are broken and you can't remove them so this means you can't replace the trucks unless you send it in. So I'm returning it cause there broken but my second one will be here in two days just like that. Still it is awesome. High speed has some serious tourqe and when you go up hill the tourqe kicks in. You have to learn to tougle the remote so you don't fall off cause when you hit the breaks or gos you better hold on and did I mention it has a reverse?!!!!?!
customer_reviews.author: Meade78

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Remote... speed fluctuations terrible wheels.
customer_reviews.text: This board has potential! But the remote sensitivity is spotty and the acceleration and deceleration dial is cheap and not accurate. I flew off the board several times. The board has large wheels, unfortunately they are rock hard and you feel the smallest bumps. Rolling over moderate cracks makes it feel like you are hitting a curb. To the manufacturer: upgrade the remote and make the wheels bigger and softer and this board will sellout! Even if you increase the price $100... but as of now the board is dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: Is 52 too old for your first electric longboard? Just ask my dog!
customer_reviews.text: This is my dog Raven’s first longboard purchase ever and the first time I’ve been on a skateboard in 35 years, and this NG2 has changed my life! The learning curve is next to zero and this board practically teaches you to ride it. Throttle is very predictable after the first acceleration, and brakes like a dream to this rookie. And I must mention the full body workout that is helping me shed inches around my waist. I am loving it! I’ve got a lot of getting used to skating to do, and I’m way looking forward to doing it on this Swagboard!
customer_reviews.author: Raven Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good power, good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Im 225lbs, 6'2". My stance is near the axles. I don't do jumps, tricks, or jump on it. It has held up just fine. The battery and controller case reinforce it. It has a high and low power. Low has a very smooth power band. High has some uneven acceleration and slowing. At my weight DO NOT start it going up hill or start on a hill to go up. Make sure you have momentum to go up low inclines.
customer_reviews.author: David Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Save your cash for a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This powered longboard is not the one you want. The marketing for this product is well done but the product itself is simply not worth the cost. Save your money and purchase an evolve, or at least a yacoo. This longboard is exemely difficult to keep under your feet and will very likely result in your injury. There is no reliable indication of battery life, the remote sticks resulting in uncontrolled acceleration, and the ride quality is terrible. The deck is too narrow, and the wheels are small and lack any ability to grip. This board will dump you on the pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zero complains
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my cousin who has no skill level in longboard but loves to try it. This electric longboard offers a lot of advantages. He was able to ride in without any fear. The charging only takes up to four hours from empty to full. This is one of the best electric longboard for a new riders who wants a longboard to learn the skill.
customer_reviews.author: May JY

customer_reviews.title: Worst skateboard I’ve ever owned, dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the worst and most dangerous words I’ve ever ridden in 20 years of riding electric skateboards. They need to get their act together before people get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Very dangerous and will cause harm stay away
customer_reviews.text: as u can see on the video the board made some kind of sound and then stopped immediately and lunched me forward without any cause after i fell down it went back to normal. My advise stay away i only has this board for 2 days and already issues imagen having it for the long haul
customer_reviews.author: Dimkaa

customer_reviews.title: Lemon board
customer_reviews.text: I rode the board around the neighborhood three blocks after charging it, seem to work really well. I use the remote on low speed setting and was a blast. I charged it up and went to use it again made it halfway around the block and it died. I pushed at home. Charged it again, turned on and it continued to beep and not engage to ride. Emailed customer support, twice with no reply, called company today, on hold for 15 minutes and finally hung up. Disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy this skateboard
customer_reviews.text: This is the first electric skateboard I've ever purchased and i have to say it is AWESOME! I've only had it for few days but it already feels like one of the best things I've ever bought. Rides so smooth, perfect speeds, breaks, reverse! Wireless remote is fantastic. It will very very randomly continue a command longer than you told it to.
customer_reviews.author: Omilia

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the brakes
customer_reviews.text: The problem I have with this board is when it's on level two and you let off the throttle it instantly stops sometimes even if you don't apply the brakes I took a hard fall because of it. Now I'm afraid to ride in level two unsure of when it might do that instant stop again.
customer_reviews.author: Sun

customer_reviews.title: amazing except...delay from acceleration to no acceleration is dangerously long
customer_reviews.text: This board is amazing. Fast, quite, long range, hands free, power but.... I can't give it a better review than 2 stars because the delay for the remote to stop the motor from accelerating is so long that it is not fun and gets pretty dangerous when you are going fast. IMO this is a software/hardware issue. On other boards I have owned the motor immediately stops accelerating when you let go of the accelerator. This one does not do that, be warned. Every thing else about the board is amazing. The trucks are a little soft even after you tighten them up.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Maitzen

customer_reviews.title: Fast is very fast tighten trucks first. And is stops on a dime
customer_reviews.text: The breaking stops and you go off the front. It has power and the fast speed is not for a beginner. I set it on high after a few days and it took off and started the wobble from loose trucks. I drove into grass and took a bad fall hurting shoulder,but love it. Be careful its fast.
customer_reviews.author: George & Michelle Canon

customer_reviews.title: Electric board
customer_reviews.text: This board is excellent!!!! I've had it now about 1 weeks and already put about 90 miles on it. battery last approximately 5 miles at the speed I ride at and takes less than 2 hours to fully charge. My girlfriend just bought one and we love riding together. The days I don't ride it I find myself missing it!!! If you like to have fun buy this board.
customer_reviews.author: Xian Huang

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous remote Accelerates on its own
customer_reviews.text: I own several boards and am an experienced rider. This board is just plain dangerous!! The board speed sticks and at Times actually accelerates to an uncontrollable speed on its own causing you to lose control!! Save yourself the Injuries and purchase another brand!! I strongly suggest not purchasing this board!!
customer_reviews.author: Seasoned Rider

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun--Love the Hands-Free Control
customer_reviews.text: I am not an experienced skateboarder, so I can't really speak to competent skaters. But I really wanted a board that would respond to my posture instead of a remote in my hand. This one gives you both options, and both work well. It's super fun! For adventurous beginners, Highly recommended. For more experienced users? I'm not sure, but I can't imagine you'd be too disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Boyles

customer_reviews.title: FATALLY DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: MAJOR INJURY RISK!!!!!’ DO NOT BUY!!! Board lost power and went into free fall mode which nearly killed me on a huge hill. Company will not discuss with me or talk w me at all. Horrible. Dangerous
customer_reviews.author: Brett Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Best buy in a while
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this for beginners. However, this is a great board for the price. I use mine almost every day. I don't use the controller but it feels a little light? The board allows you to control the speed and direction with your weight and stance which is pretty cool. It allows you to have empty hands, or in my case groceries. Batteries seem good so far. Short charging time. Pretty fast. It is a heavy beast but it rides great.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great electronic skateboard
customer_reviews.text: I Got this one weeks ago. My son enjoys riding this skateboard. So far have put over 30 miles on it and he love it. The braking is superb. It’s heavy, but you get used to it and the small size is easy to take with you wherever you are headed.
customer_reviews.author: Angle

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, strong breaks and acceleration, good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I can agree that there are better E-boards for a lower price out there but if you want a board to ship within a week or two, this is the one. Along with the board itself does slide a bit if you break too hard at high speeds and it's acceleration is a bit strong but with some practice I got it down. Over all it's not the best board but definitely not the worst and I can say it is a good board for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Prince Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Find joy in life again
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this impartial review as the 50 year old man I am and as the 13 year old the board made me feel like!!!#no regrets...so far...but I plan to test this product further everyday ,we will see how long it holds up and if it brakes...how well customer feedback is...so far...excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bad product. Came out of the box broken and will not charge. I will be returning it tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product & service Stinks!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within a month & claim/repair process is HORRIBLE. Customer service stinks.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this electric scooter. Its shape and color make me feel very fashionable. Color matching is my favorite. I am an outdoor enthusiast. I will go to the park to play with friends on weekends. To my charm, its performance is also very good, it is definitely a worthy adult toy.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Your next favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today, I’d eagerly been waiting it’s arrival... it did not disappoint!! Have not yet used hands free mode but using the remote is easy- just do not brake too hard while on high speed- you’ll take a digger. Super fun, solid board, great maneuverability, so much fun! Can’t wait til it catches a full charge so I can go out for a long ride.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Wohl

customer_reviews.title: the motor is very powerful
customer_reviews.text: the skateboard comes with a strong motor that activates once you push off. i got this for my son in their early teens the skateboard is very well built and strong. the finish and datailing on the board are really good.
customer_reviews.author: tengF.c

customer_reviews.title: unrideable unless you're on super smooth surface
customer_reviews.text: no shock absorbtion at all. feels really really uncomfortable to ride on a normal sidewalk let alone anything with rocks or gravel on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful company, bad product and avoids contact with customers
customer_reviews.text: This company has sold us a defective product and won't respond, repair or refund for months. In fact, they are trying to extort MORE money from us for repairs to a DEFECTIVE product with an extended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Allison and Elihu Cress

customer_reviews.title: It’s real fun...Don’t slam on the brakes it’ll toss you like a upset bronco!
customer_reviews.text: This is alot of fun...the battery lasts about 30 minutes riding all over the place on high. The wheels seemed somewhat used. The hand remote didn’t have a charger though. I used one from the Samsung phone. The brakes take some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Best commuter skateboard!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s super quick and easy to use! Definitely a must have for city commutes and travel! Holds a charge long enough to get where I’m going and very user friendly! Comes out of the box ready to ride! No adjustments or assembly was needed!
customer_reviews.author: Ginge

customer_reviews.title: Good starter board
customer_reviews.text: Board works good. Bought for my 15 year old. It's a good starter board for the money but just keep in mind the battery only lasts for 20-25 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great skateboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old for Christmas. He is about 90 pounds. He loves it! He says it flies down the road. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super fast. My daughter absolutely loves it. A bit heavy and certainly not for adults. It gives in the middle, but I’m at least 220.
customer_reviews.author: Papa_Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Reliability problem
customer_reviews.text: It failed after 30 days. Emailed customer service, no response yet.
customer_reviews.author: robert w  anthony

customer_reviews.title: Kill joy
customer_reviews.text: This was the second long board i got after the first one got replaced. Definitely make sure all bolts are not stripped through the wood. Check them once you open the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I rode this for 20 min before it died and wouldnt recharge. Also randomly kicked me off at a high speed fortunately close to grass. Not a operating error wasnt even touching the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Riggins

customer_reviews.title: dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Where do i start this thing pick up speed by it self i lost control and i almost got ran over by a uhal truck not to mention it stopped working the second day i bought it
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk
customer_reviews.text: Power button broke 20 mins into using and never received the warranty i paid for i would recommend a meepo over this
customer_reviews.author: Christian Boley

customer_reviews.title: Best Electric Skateboard !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he loves it. Smooth ride , very sturdy and is fast! I definitely recommend this skateboard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this purchase. The range is a lie the mph is a lie the remote sucks and sticks on brake so you fall often. All around a very crappy longboard
customer_reviews.author: Nickolas Beckstead - Braghetta

customer_reviews.title: I received a board that doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The Product sadly will not turn on or work at all , will be contacting customer service tomorrow to figure out how to return it :(
customer_reviews.author: Cheech

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I need you guys to make waterproof one's that are able to accelerate without it shutting off or disconnected from receiver
customer_reviews.author: David Starling

customer_reviews.title: What can I say it's a homerun
customer_reviews.text: It's a hit totally enjoyable to ride for a 57 year old I'd recommend it 4 sure Thanks Swagtron for a cool product Eric
customer_reviews.author: Eric Tlling

product_meta.title: SWAGSKATE NG2 38” A.I. Powered Electric Longboard Skateboard Hands-Free or Remote Control 900W Dual-Hub Brushless Motor 3.5” x 52mm PU Wheels
feature_bullets: “Look ma no hands! ” — control the Ng2 e-board like a traditional cruiser skateboard by shifting your weight on the deck No remote required Thanks to intelligent weight and balance sensors navigation is all about “the lean ”
The need for Speed — one of the fastest electric longboards on the market The Ng2 cruises up to 18 mph and can easily conquer 15° INCLINES with a powerful pair of brushless Rear 450-watt motors

Full-featured remote control — although designed to be hands-free this motorized longboard also comes with a remote that can control every aspect of the ride from accelerating to switching speed modes
Built for Flexibility & Strength — The NG2’s longboard deck offers up true resilience thanks to 6 layers of premium maple wood sandwiched between 2 layers of bamboo Supports up to 220 lb max weight

World-class service — every new Swag Tron powered longboard is protected by our 90-Day limited and backed by our expert team of support specialists staffed in the U S and available via live chat email or phone

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
